description: half length portrait directed right and looking front; shoulder length hair; wearing armor and plain collar; battle in background; in an oval with coat of arms upper left corner and wreath upper right corner of sheet
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black :HENRY DUC DE LA TREMOILLE ET DE / TOVARS PAIR DE FRANCE / Moncornet ex. c.p. | on sheet in pencil: 2-83
title: Portrait of Henry Duc de la Tremoille et de Thovars Pair de France
